title: JRT2015 Complimentary Education Workshop | Costa Mesa, CA
desc: Janus Road Tour 2015 Learning the Fundamentals: Insights and Education from Thoughtful Experts Whether you're a self storage developer, owner/operator or investor, you won't want to miss the JRT Complimentary Education Workshop. This is your chance to explore the latest developments in  self storage conversions, retrofit/refurbishing, feasibility, financial options, facility operations and individual door access control & security . We will educate you on the tools to become successful and develop a network of colleagues who are serious about maximizing value to their site.  This year's program will have you thinking inside the box. Converting an empty building can be very lucrative, furthermore placing a facility in an area already densely populated by residents and businesses.  Thursday, Dec. 3, 2015 10:30 AM - 5 PM Friday, Dec. 4, 2015 8 AM - 4 PM Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa 3050 Bristol St. Costa Mesa, CA 714.438.4993 $169/ni  Complimentary Education Workshops Day 1: Day 2: *Each registered attendee is eligible to win a FREE conversion layout or 25 ADA kits  Learn more or register: janusroadtour@janusintl.com or call Lauren at 770.562.2850 x373
